name: Shih Ho
description:
A boy finds himself in a peculiar situation after being bitten by a vampire girl. To find her, he must follow her clues through the small town of Coffington. But what is our hero truly seeking?

KILL SCREEN: THE LOVING HORROR OF LET THE RIGHT ONE IN LIVES ON IN THIS VAMPIRIC VIDEOGAME

Nominated for SPILPRISEN 2016 - Best Showcase
